channel.title: Finding the best sorce and client...can you help me?
channel.description:
i spend my last 5 days downloading sources and testing then i'm tired and i lookig for the best source you know so post here the best source or client you find or that you have more fun playing the more complete source etc...
post the source or the client and where i can find and download...,
i think it will be very usefull for noobs like me that don't know too much about java scripts and it will stop all the noobs asks that you an expert in sources don't wanna ask...
i'll be very happy if i find a source to play... thank you very much if you post...if you not problaby it will be in you mind for the last of your life.

item.title: Finding the best sorce and client...can you help me?
item.dc:creator: @Yuh_Spongescapeowns Yuh! Spongescapeowns!
item.description:
@Yuh_Spongescapeowns wrote:

[quote=“King-Switch-Blade, post:2, topic:35346”]Title: A list of many server sources, clients, compressors, and Java applications.

Ok since it is the Holidays I have built this list. These are the things this topic will include:

[ul][li]The two main server families.[/li]
[li]All the edited servers the poeple on this forum made up to page 10.[/li]
[li]All of the clients I can get my hands on.[/li]
[li]Programs to compress and decompress many useful archives.[/li]
[li]My very own server builder program will be here.[/li][/ul]

[glow=red,2,300]======================================TWO MAIN SERVER FAMILIES==============================[/glow]

Ok there are two main server families. The first family is the World 8 family. Here it is:

World 8 -> Cheezscape 80 -> Testscape

Whitescape -> Hybridscape 6 | Project 16 v6

Every single source is based off of at least one of these. Most of the more supreme servers are usually based off of Cheezscape 80 and/or the Project 16s. The less popular server sources are usually based off of Testscape (or a source that is under a Testscape) and/or the Project 16s.

[glow=red,2,300]========================================CUSTOM SOURCES================================[/glow]

These are the sources that you people actually posted. I will put the person’s name that posted this source after "//"s. Here is the list:

TryScape edit 1 //im a new newb

NOOBSCAPE //andrewdawg

NewScape version 2 //henry

SantaScape version 1.2 //alexia

Dunescape-Pkz //dune

Televatorscape //televator0

BattleScape version 1 //krawks12

PPScape beta //Sledge

ScapeScape //IcyPimp

Tzscape //dr jekyll

haxscape //1 dum taco

DMCscape //DMC

Candescape version 1.6 //haruki

RapeScape //Oo Java

WhoGivesAScape version 1.2 //Staccia

Ultimate PK version 2.0 //Doobie

DeclinedScape //puretrainererer

LollyScape //ollie123

Zosscape //zoss0

Porno Scape //DMC

LaxiScape update 3 //LaxikaReloaded

ZirakScape //Zirakac

RealisticScape version 0.6 //alexia

sniffyscape //badly4sniffy

pimpscape //killamess

Mitchellscape //runesaber

EyreScape //Skating On Java

Moosescape //skys shadow

R00nscape //Mrquarter

Phonescape //Phonecheck

[glow=red,2,300]=============================================CLIENTS=================================[/glow]

Ok these are the different client I have managed to track down so far:

Moparscape 3.2 with Ayran //moparisthebest

EyreScape Client //Skating On Java
(this requires this cache to use)

BlakeScape //??? (I do not know the owner)

Welshscape Client //welshy

EnurScape Client //ada

[glow=red,2,300]==========================================COMPRESSORS=============================[/glow]

7zip

WinRar

Squeez

[glow=red,2,300]=======================================OTHER APPLICATIONS===========================[/glow]

Server Source Builder version 2 //mod taharok

[glow=red,2,300]=================================================================================[/glow]

Credits: winterlove, Xerocheez, Hybridscape Development Team, Wolf, Nvi Ible, moparisthebest, im a new newb, andrewdawg, henry, alexia, dune, televator0, Phonecheck, krawks12, Sledge, IcyPimp, dr jekyll, 1 dum taco, DMC, haruki, Oo Java, Staccia, Mrquarter, Doobie, puretrainererer, ollie123, zoss0, LaxikaReloaded, Zirakac, badly4sniffy, killamess, runesaber, Skating On Java, this one goes to BlakeScape client maker, skys shadow, welshy, 7zip creators, RARLAB (built WinRar), Speed Project (built Squeez), and finally mod taharok (for putting this entire topic together for you to read and get board over )

URL: Click on the name of the sources above to download them.

Outline: These servers are excellent and desever much applaud!

Screenshots: None, Sorry, but you still definatly need to play these server sources!

Lolz now enjoy the listings I provided for you above. This one was more enjoyable ane only took me 2-3 hours. Happy holidays! (remember to read the NOTE.)

NOTE IF YOU WANT ME TO ADD YOUR APPLICATION, CLIENT, ANOTHER COMPRESSOR, OR YOUR SOURCE TO THE LIST ABOVE, PM THE LINK OF THE TOPIC OR POST THE TOPIC LINK BELOW.

~Mod Taharok[br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 12:35:54 AM[/size][hr][glow=black,2,300]Title:[/glow] All top servers with fast downloading.

[glow=black,2,300]Credits:[/glow] Ok, there is a lot of people so I will just made a list showing them below:

[ul][li]Nvi Ible[/li]
[li]Xerocheez[/li]
[li]Hybridscape Development Team[/li]
[li]Wolf[/li]
[li]winterlove[/li]
[li]Anyone else who has contributed to making the following sources, thank-you and this number goes to you! <3[/li][/ul]

[glow=black,2,300]Url:[/glow] Just click on the names of the servers below to download that server.

[glow=black,2,300]Outline:[/glow] Well I can say the main outline in this is that all of these people ^ have made some EXCELLENT servers and you should DEFINATLY player them (well you can’t reall help it anyways considering all of these servers are based off of the first one.)

[glow=black,2,300]Screenshots:[/glow] Sorry, I have none. But I can tell you that you need to try these sources!

Ok I have tracked down the following sources and cut them down and re-compressed them into 4 basic formats (rar, zip, 7z, and tar):

===============================================================================================

World 8

Cheezscape

Testscape

Whitescape

Hybridscape

Project 16

I will also include SOME of the different versions (depending on the source since I am not posting all 80 copies of Cheezscape lolz.)

===========================================================================================

World 8

World 8.7z
World 8.rar
World 8.tar
World 8.zip

Cheezscape

Version 80

Cheezscape v80.7z
Cheezscape v80.rar
Cheezscape v80.tar
Cheezscape v80.zip

Version 78

Cheezscape v78.7z
Cheezscape v78.rar
Cheezscape v78.tar
Cheezscape v78.zip

Testscape

Testscape.7z
Testscape.rar
Testscape.tar
Testscape.zip

Whitescape

Whitescape.7z
Whitescape.rar
Whitescape.tar
Whitescape.zip

Hybridscape

Hybridscape.7z
Hybridscape.rar
Hybridscape.tar
Hybridscape.zip

Project 16

Version 1

Project 16 v1.7z
Project 16 v1.rar
Project 16 v1.tar
Project 16 v1.zip

Version 3

Project 16 v3.7z
Project 16 v3.rar
Project 16 v3.tar
Project 16 v3.zip

Version 4.5

Project 16 v4.5.7z
Project 16 v4.5.rar
Project 16 v4.5.tar
Project 16 v4.5.zip

Version 6

Project 16 v6.7z
Project 16 v6.rar
Project 16 v6.tar
Project 16 v6.zip

Version 6 edit 7

HALVED SOURCE
HALVED SOURCE
HALVED SOURCE
HALVED SOURCE

=========================================================================================

Ok I hope you enjoyed my post. It took me about 3 hours to do. Enjoy!

Credz To Mod Taharok[/quote]Lol nice list

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Whitebread Whitebread
item.description:
@Whitebread wrote:

i downloaded testscape but it doesnt save the game i downloaded ultimatepk but i cant log in i downloaded project v,6 cant log in tos scape cant log in…

i’m using Moparscape 3.2 with Ayran //moparisthebest

i was just needing one server you give me a list it doesnt help me too much but anyway thanks
but what server of those list you like much more?

Read full topic

i spend my last 5 days downloading sources and testing then i’m tired and i lookig for

the more complete source etc…
